Title: Coupon Chain Token - Token Generation Event
Body: ‚ùóProject Description:  Mezzofy presents ‚ÄúCoupon Chain‚Äù, Revolutionising Digital Coupons with Blockchain. This is a  ‚ÄòReverse ICO‚Äô or ‚ÄòTokenised Business Offering‚Äô (TBO).  Mezzofy has been operating a successful digital coupon business in Hong Kong and South-East Asia since 2014 and counts among its 1100 customers brands such as Starbucks, Body Shop, Hong Kong Airport Authority, NTT, Maxim‚Äôs and LOreal.  Token Details:  Ticker: CCT (Coupon Chain Token)  Total Supply: 1 billion  CCT Price: $0.09 USD  Softcap: 4m USD  Hardcap: 24m USD  Contributions accepted in: ETH & FIAT  Tokens Generated on: December 31st 2018  The Token Sale of 300 Million Tokens will be divided into 4 lots. When a lot is sold out, the next Lot will automatically begin. Every Lot will have a bonus pool to be shared among the eligible contributors. In total, up to 100 Million Tokens will be used to support various promotion programs to Contributors: Airdrop (25M Tokens including the Additional Token Bonus to Early Supporters), Bounty (15M Tokens), Referral (15M Tokens), Pool Bonus (30M Tokens) and Coupons (15M Tokens)  Each of the 4 ICO lots have different bonus rates:  ‚úÖLot 1: 33% Discount + Pool Bonus ‚úÖLot 2: 22% Discount + Pool Bonus ‚úÖLot 3: 11% Discount + Pool Bonus ‚ùéLot 4: No Discount + Pool Bonus  ICO Website: http://www.coupon-chain.org/  Existing business: http://www.mezzofy.com/  Youtube: https://[Suspicious link removed]/2vWEeEa  Lightpaper: https://docsend.com/view/dbeefmb  Presentation on Mezzofy business: https://docsend.com/view/2kbdy8h  Press: https://thesiliconreview.com/magazines/magazine_profile.php?id=143&page=5  Telegram: https://t.me/couponchaintoken  üìß Email: hello@coupon-chain.org  Get 10 free CCT!: http://couponchain.mezzofy.com/campaigns/A1000197   Roadmap: By end of Q4 2018 development of the blockchain coupon platform will have commenced and beta testing will begin in Q1 2019.  Go-Live date of the platform is scheduled for June 2019.  The open source element of the platform will be operational from Q3 2019 onwards.   Team: The Mezzofy team is 100% integrated into the Coupon Chain team. The C-Level have worked in leadership positions in companies such as Dairyfarm, Timberland, Bauch & Lomb and Carrefour.
